scripts.watch: npm run build && watchify src/index.coffee --exclude morearty --exclude react --exclude react-dom --extension=.cjsx --extension=.coffee -o public/index.js
scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p public && cp src/index.html public && browserify -r morearty -r react -r react-dom > public/vendor.js
scripts.build: browserify src/index.coffee --exclude morearty --exclude react --exclude react-dom --extension=.cjsx --extension=.coffee -o public/index.js
